name: coursera_scrape_instructor
description: Scrape a Coursera instructor profile page. Returns name, title, institution, bio, courses taught, learner count, and rating.

steps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('h1'); const allText = document.body.innerText; const titleEl = document.querySelector('h1 + p, h1 + div p, [class*="title"] p'); const institutionEls = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/partners/"]'); const institutions = []; institutionEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 80 && !institutions.includes(t)) institutions.push(t); }); const bioEls = document.querySelectorAll('section p, [class*="bio"] p, [class*="about"] p'); let bio = ''; bioEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t.length > bio.length && t.length > 50) bio = t; }); const avatarEl = document.querySelector('img[alt*="instructor" i], img[alt*="profile" i], [class*="avatar"] img, [class*="profile"] img, main img'); const learnersMatch = allText.match(/(\d[\d,\.]+[KkMm]?)\s*(learner|student)/i); const ratingEl = document.querySelector('[role="meter"], [aria-label*="stars"], [class*="cds-RatingStar"]'); const coursesCountMatch = allText.match(/(\d+)\s*(course|specialization)/i); const courses = []; const courseLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/learn/"], a[href*="/specializations/"]'); const seen = new Set(); courseLinks.forEach(function(el) { const href = el.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (seen.has(href) || courses.length >= 10) return; const h = el.querySelector('h3, h2, strong'); const text = h ? h.textContent.trim() : el.textContent.trim().substring(0, 100); if (!text || text.length < 3) return; seen.add(href); const parent = el.closest('li, div[class*="card"], div[class*="Card"]'); const rEl = parent ? parent.querySelector('[role="meter"], [aria-label*="stars"]') : null; courses.push({ name: text, rating: rEl ? (rEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || rEl.textContent.trim()) : '', url: href.startsWith('http') ? href : 'https://www.coursera.org' + href }); }); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', institution: institutions.join(', '), bio: bio.substring(0, 500), avatar: avatarEl ? avatarEl.getAttribute('src') : '', learners: learnersMatch ? learnersMatch[0] : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || ratingEl.textContent.trim()) : '', course_count: coursesCountMatch ? coursesCountMatch[1] : String(courses.length), courses: courses, profile_url: window.location.href }
